casebody.data:
WELLS FARGO BANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, AS TRUSTEE FOR OPTION ONE MORTGAGE LOAN TRUST 2003-5 ASSET-BACKED CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2003-5, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Richard S. MARINO, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
Mrs. Richard S. Marino, his wife; Deborah A. Marino, Mr. Marino, husband of Deborah A. Marino; Stephen Mauro, Unparalleled Paralegals LLC, Patricia Ronayne, State of New Jersey, Kimberly Hering, Robert Hering and Mansfield Holdings LLC, Defendants. C-262 September Term 2018
081145 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 2, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003581-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
